resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MK Button use the Storage and location permission
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MK Button use the bluetooth and location permission
MK Button requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, MK Button cannot be used normally.
After that, MK Button could search and connect with the MK Button
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MK Button use the Location permission
MK Button requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, MK Button cannot be used normally.
MK Button requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, MK Button cannot be used normally.
Are you sure you want to quit?
